messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that specializes in technical documentation and code analysis.
messages.name: system_assistant

messages.content: Please analyze this code snippet and explain what it does: function fibonacci(n) { return n <= 1 ? n : fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2); }
messages.name: user_1

messages.content: This is a recursive implementation of the Fibonacci sequence. It calculates the nth Fibonacci number by adding the previous two numbers.
messages.name: assistant_1

messages.content: Can you optimize it for better performance?
messages.name: user_2

function.name: get_weather

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

functions.name: calculate_fibonacci
